roleset.name: arrange in a particular fashion
roleset.note: STRUCTURE-V NOTES: The arg2 is always some descriptor of the way the arg1 is arranged orset up. That descriptor can take several different manifestations,hence the use of the functional tags on a numbered argument. (from structure.01-v)

example.name: as manner
example.text: [Jaguar and GM]-1 hope *trace*-1 to win Jaguar shareholders' approval for the accord partly by *trace*-1 structuring it in a way that wouldn't preclude a full Ford bid once the golden share expires.
example.arg: in a way that wouldn't preclude a full Ford bid once the golden share expires

example.name: as purpose
example.text: [John's class schedule]-1 is structured *trace*-1 to let him sleep until noon every day.
example.arg: to let him sleep until noon every day

example.name: as as
example.text: John structured his dissertation as an exercise in obfuscation.
